member.name: M:Reutberg.IReutbergService.GetQuote(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the current price for the specified ticker.
member.param: Ticker for which to retrieve current price.
member.exception: Thrown is retrieval of quote fails.

member.name: M:Reutberg.IReutbergService.Buy(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes a buy trade for the specified ticker of the specified size, and returns the total value of the trade (which should be +ve).
member.param: Ticker for which to execute trade.
member.exception: Thrown is trade fails to execute correctly.
member.returns: Total value of trade in USD.

member.name: M:Reutberg.IReutbergService.Sell(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes a sell trade for the specified ticker of the specified size, and returns the total value of the trade (which should be -ve).
member.param: Ticker for which to execute trade.
member.exception: Thrown is trade fails to execute correctly.
member.returns: Total value of trade in USD.
